title-group.article-title: The Iterative Convex Minorant Algorithm for Nonparametric Estimation

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1998 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: The problem of minimizing a smooth convex function over a specific cone in R<sup>n</sup> is frequently encountered in nonparametric statistics. For that type of problem we suggest an algorithm and show that this algorithm converges to the solution of the minimization problem. Moreover, a simulation study is presented, showing the superiority of our algorithm compared to the EM algorithm in the interval censoring case 2 setting.
